item.description:
Hi everyone, get ready for a SUNDAY meetup at FENWAY BARK!

Fenway Bark is a "pawsome" new pet hotel, day care, boutique, groomer, etc, etc, etc. They're air conditioned, they've got plenty of free parking, and they even provide us with our own private room to play in!! The staff is super nice and the views of Boston Harbor are great - you can even watch the planes landing at Logan!

So come play from 10am - 12pm. We get 20% off all services and products during that time.

From Fenway Bark: For the safety of all our guests, we require that all dogs who use our indoor lawns have all our health requirements met - documentation showing up to date vaccinations and a negative fecal float in the past 6 months. Veterinary records can be faxed to Fenway Bark at 617-507-8271 in advance of the meetup. Intact dogs need to be kept on a non retractable leash for the safety of all guests.

Meetup dues are $3 per frenchie...this covers the $12 monthly fee to host our meetup.com group online. Anything received in excess of the $12 will be donated to the French Bulldog Rescue Network in the group's name. :)

Then after your frenchie is done playing and it's not too hot, head on over to the SoWa Open Market in the SouthEnd. Frenchies are VERY welcome at this outdoor craft & farmers market. In fact, Nino's mom will be there with her Bonjour Nino line of jewelry and Bella's parents will be there with their Funky Farmhouse collection of goodies!

Thanks so much, we can't wait to see you! Letitia & Clyde

group.name: The Boston French Bulldog Meetup Group

item.name: June French Bulldog Meetup - part deux!
